Details.Name: sc_card_name
Details.Feature: DBS Woman's Mastercard

Details.Name: sc_main_benefit
Details.Feature: Enjoy Comfort & CityCab priority booking status.
Receive 2 complimentary visits to True Fitness Centres. Receive joining fee waiver (S$200) when you sign up for a 24-month True Fitness membership.
Earn 5X DBS Points (or 10 miles) for every S$5 on Online Shopping. Enjoy flexible payments over 12 months at 0% interest and 0% processing fee.

Details.Name: sc_gift_details
Details.Feature: Up to S$120 Cashback:
1. S$70 Cashback when you charge a min. of S$700 per month for the first 2 months AND
2. S$50 Cashback when you apply for DBS Cashline at the same time

Details.Name: sc_gift_cond
Details.Feature: Apply for the card before 31 March 2016.

Details.Name: sc_other_fee
Details.Feature: Fee Waiver

Details.Name: sc_disclosure
Details.Feature: Earn 1 DBS point (or 2 miles) for every S$5 charged to the card. Additional 4X DBS Points (or 8 miles) for the first S$1,000 spend every calendar month.
To enjoy Comfort & CityCab priority booking status, enrol with 250 DBS Points and charge a minimum of 3 retail transactions every month.

Details.Name: sc_entertainment_details
Details.Feature: $5 = 1X DBS Point
$5 = 10X DBS Points for online retail spend
Additional 9X DBS Points are only applicable to the first S$2,000 online retail spend every calendar month
$5 = 3X DBS Points for overseas retail spend
Complimentary Access to selected True Fitness and True Yoga Centres twice a month

Details.Name: sc_rewards_details
Details.Feature: $5 = 1X DBS Point
$5 = 10X DBS Points for online retail spend
Additional 9X DBS Points are only applicable to the first S$2,000 online retail spend every calendar month
$5 = 3X DBS Points for overseas retail spend

Details.Name: sc_shopping_details
Details.Feature: $5 = 1X DBS Point
$5 = 10X DBS Points for online retail spend
Additional 9X DBS Points are only applicable to the first S$2,000 online retail spend every calendar month
$5 = 3X DBS Points for overseas retail spend
